oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yin, Binglun
Curtin, William
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special quasi-random structures for the 6-component high entropy alloys
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: special quasi-random structures (SQSs)
high entropy alloys
random alloys
misfit volumes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a general method to calculate the average misfit volumes of atoms in any random alloy via DFT calculations. The method is validated with an example of a 6-component equi-composition high entropy alloy. The special quasi-random structures (SQSs) used in our work are reported here.
